```{r}
library(tmap)
library(sf)
library(raster)
```

```{r}
npp <- raster('rasters/annual_npp.tif')
sst <- list.files("rasters", full.names = TRUE, pattern = "sst") %>%
  stack() %>%
  projectRaster(npp) %>%
  mean()
  
tm_shape(sst) + tm_raster()
```
